_header: Jesu that for us would die
Subjects: religious instruction; sins, deadly; Ten Commandments; Creed, apostles’; Cross, hours of; Lord’s Prayer
_description: On the Deadly Sins, Ten Commandments, Pater noster, Creed, Ave Maria, and the Hours of the Cross — 308 lines in couplets

NLS1921.First Lines:
Iesu þat for vs wolde dieAnd was boren of maiden
                    marie…
NLS1921.Last Lines:
…To þat blisse bringe vs heÞat is and was and euer
                    sschal be
NLS1921.Attributed Title:
[On þe seuen dedli] sinnes (top of page cropped) (f.
                    70ra)
